summary:
Advisor - key words are recognized expert, creativity, inquisitive, flexibility,  team player.  Key skills include working in inter-disciplinary groups at high level to providing solutions combining to map the subsurface and understanding the role of how geophysics interacts with other disciplines whether technical and non-technical. Global experience with more than 30 years worldwide experience in land and transition zone seismic acquisition. Mainly in staff functions including survey design using the latest state-of-the-art technology such as single sensor recording and project management. Currently providing 3D survey design services via EPI. 

Specialties: Land, TZ/OBC and marine seismic survey design and generating geo-solutions
